title: ImmortLily Rise: Immortal Hearts Trilogy - Book One
description: Whether this world lives or dies, everyone will forever have the name Lily Du Plessis on their lipsLily Du Plessis is not your average teenager. She was born to fulfil a prophecy. She grows up protected in a sleepy little town where all she has to fear is her Grandfather. One day that changes drastically when she has to start a new life on the other side of the world, in a strange city with hidden secrets and unknown dangers.Challenged with the usual teenage problems of making new friends - and new enemies, falling in and out of love, struggling with the many secrets of her past, and the reality of her new future. Lily has the additional dilemma of dealing with a highly dangerous, and possibly, deadly infatuation.The supernatural forces at play will do anything to stop her reaching her true potential, and the outcome could mean the difference between life and death.
author: G.E.  Beyers
